episode.title: Devastation, Pessimism, and Rage
episode.rawTitle: 344: ‘Devastation, Pessimism, and Rage’, With Glenn Fleishman
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Glenn Fleishman returns to the show to talk about Elon Musk’s impending acquisition of Twitter, Apple’s credibility problem when arguing against being required to allow sideloading on iOS, and Glenn’s new (and much-needed) book, “Take Control of Untangling Connections”.
episode.showNotes:
Glenn Fleishman returns to the show to talk about Elon Musk's impending acquisition of Twitter, Apple's credibility problem when arguing against being required to allow sideloading on iOS, and Glenn's new (and much-needed) book, Take Control of Untangling Connections.
